nodes.text: Nova Strider was the name of a walker manufactured by the Galactic Republic. In 3630 BBY it was part of the forces brought by the Republic Supreme Commander Jace Malcom to Iokath.

Nova Strider appears in Star Wars: The Old Republic: Knights of the Eternal Throne during the War on Iokath. If the player chooses the ally with the Republic, which is neither a Light Side or Dark Side choice, the walker is upgraded with Iokath technology and the player pilots it during the assault on the Imperial base.
